Trig Identities

$$ \begin{array}{l} cos^2(x) + sin^2(x) =1 \\
1 + tan^2(x) = sec^2(x) \end{array} $$

$$ \begin{array}{ll} sin(A+B) & = & sin(A)cos(B) + cos(A)sin(B) \\
cos(A+B) & = & cos(A)cos(B) - sin(A)sin(B) \\
sin(2x) & = & 2 sin(x) cos(x) \\
cos(2x) & = & 2 cos^2(x) - 1 = 1 - 2 sin^2(x) \end{array} $$
